TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Blhuy2, title = Blhuy2, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blhuy2} }

S.FORM: alang Blhuy ga niya mki sku Toweng si atu Hosing Ku, kwara sali buwan nya ga 11 buwan, 43 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 86% kyan ku 37 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 14% kyan ku 6 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 84%, Bunun 2%, binah lihuyan s'uli 2%. tay 'llaw na Blhuy2 hya' ga rgyax krahu' tay 'zil na Blhuy2 hya' ga Sincyuk. tay mkyahu' na Blhuy2 hya' ga Sincyuk. tay mkraya' na Blhuy2 hya' ga Taipei.

alang Blhoy ga niya mki sko Toweng si ato Hosing Ko, kwara sali bowan nya ga 11 bowan, 43 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 86% kyan ko 37 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 14% kyan ko 6 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 84%, Bonon 2%, binah lihoyan s'oli 2%. tay 'llaw na Blhoy2 hya' ga rgyax kraho' tay 'zil na Blhoy2 hya' ga Sincyok. tay mkyaho' na Blhoy2 hya' ga Sincyok. tay mkraya' na Blhoy2 hya' ga Taipei.
